title: Tfboys王源18岁生日演唱会 兄弟王俊凯易烊千玺送祝福和礼物

json.text: next we also have wishes from your two good brothers
let put your hand together to welcome karrywang and jacksonyee
come xiao yuan let go and join

your brothers to celebrate the 18th       
that belong to you
hello
welcome qianxi welcome xiaokai

00:00:37,820 --> 00:00:42,280
welcome karry and welcome jackson to roy 18th birthday event concert
brought a big cake and presents

let us first call jackson and karry     
to say hi to everyone
come let have karry first
hi everyone i am karry wang
welcome xiao kai
qianxi
hello everyone i am jackson yee
welcome qianxi
two of you do you have any blessing and presents you want to share face to face with roy?
what i give is a skiing hat and skiing glasses
because now it going to be winter and roy love skiing alots
take out some time and take this to skiing
using it as a motorcycle glasses is also not bad since he is 18
Sports accessories for roy hope roy have time to go exercise and work out
qianxi what present do you have for roy?
er what i giving is a typemachine a keyboard
its seem to be with bluetooth wireless connection
because roy especially love to write his own songs etc
and you can type with this and its also very convenience when playing game
yes a help to creation

wang yuan receiving this presents  
what is your feeling?
in fact is quite thoughtful because
qianxi say for this ususally i don't need to use a pen to write and i can use this to type it out as a unique and typing on paper for momento
for xiaokai this skiing hat is very important because if i skii without a skiing hat and fall into concussion
both can be used on so i think its pretty good
once again thanks to this two brothers and let take a group photo together
three of you together in today big day xiaoyuan come to the centre
come foward a little bit infront of the cake

00:02:27,580 --> 00:02:29,000
take a group photo together
and thank you to this two brothers for their wishes
and together one more time let say to roy happy birthday
3 2 1 happy birthday roy
once again thank you karrywang thank you jacksonyee
